page.title: Website Migration
page.description: Transform your existing website into a modern, high-performance Next.js application powered by AI. Preserve your content while upgrading to the latest web technologies.

aiAnalysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Our AI analyzes your website's structure, content, and design to create an optimal migration plan.

modernTech.title: Modern Technologies
modernTech.description: Upgrade to Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, and modern web standards for better performance and maintainability.

seamlessIntegration.title: Seamless Integration
seamlessIntegration.description: Migrated projects appear instantly in your workspace, ready for further customization and deployment.

startForm.title: Start Your Migration
startForm.urlDescription: Enter the URL of the website you want to migrate. Must be publicly accessible.
startForm.customInstructionsPlaceholder: Describe any specific requirements, design preferences, or features you want to preserve or modify...
startForm.customInstructionsDescription: Provide specific instructions to customize the migration process.
startForm.estimatedTimeActual: Actual time may vary based on website complexity and size.
startForm.urlInvalidError: Please enter a valid URL (including http:// or https://)
startForm.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in {seconds} seconds.
startForm.migrationStartedToast: Migration started! Redirecting to progress page...

disclaimers.usesAiTime: Migration uses AI time from your current plan
disclaimers.publicAccess: The website must be publicly accessible for analysis
disclaimers.manualAdjustment: Complex functionality may require manual adjustment after migration

exactCopy.name: Exact Copy
exactCopy.description: Preserve everything as-is, modernize code only

modernRefresh.name: Modern Refresh
modernRefresh.description: Keep design, improve UX and performance

items.content: Content and text from all pages

pricingTime.title: Pricing & Time
pricingTime.usesAiTime: Uses AI time from your current plan. Most websites migrate in under 15 minutes.

planning.title: Migration Planning
planning.description: Creating migration strategy and component mapping

transformation.title: Content Transformation
transformation.description: Converting content to modern Next.js components

deployment.title: Project Deployment
deployment.description: Finalizing project and preparing for workspace

completed.title: Migration Complete
completed.description: Your website has been successfully migrated

messages.projectNotReady: Project creation in progress, try again in a moment
